DialogueText.Text: Hello, my friend! I... stumbled across quite the peculiar sight on my way here. It was a strange, alien landscape that seemed almost hostile. I kept a safe distance, but was able to get a good view of the area. The creatures there were familiar, yet twisted, and they seemed almost mindless. Do you have any idea what that place is?
Wow! A whole new ecology, formed in the aftermath of a star colliding with our planet?! How fascinating! Thank you for sharing your findings.
